<!-- Action Figure Database App - macOS Swift Application -->

This is a Swift-based macOS application for cataloging and managing action figure collections.

## Project Structure
- SwiftUI for user interface
- Core Data for persistent storage
- MVVM architecture pattern
- Support for CRUD operations on action figure data

## Key Components
- ActionFigure entity with comprehensive data fields
- Form-based data input with validation
- Search and filtering capabilities
- Data persistence with Core Data

## Development Guidelines
- Follow Swift naming conventions
- Use property wrappers for Core Data integration
- Implement proper error handling for database operations
- Ensure responsive UI design for macOS
